saao/saa15/P334716
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}DINGIR-ia-da-aʾ lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia DI-mu a-na ma-a-te u₃ {URU}HAL.ṢU-MEŠ ša LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ŠA₃-bu ša LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ lu DUG₃.GA-šu₂ ṭe₃-e-mu ša {1}{d}AMAR.UTU-A-AŠ UD 05-KAM₂ ša {ITI}x x x x x TA@v GU₂.DU₈.A{KI} it-tu-ṣi UD x-KAM₂ ina pa-an zi-qa-x x x x x e-tar-ba TA@v x x x x ra-i-bi la x x x x x x iš-pur-an-ni x x x x x x pu-ri-ṭu x x x x x x an-nu-rig {1}x x x x x x ša LUGAL be-li₂ x x x x x x x x+x x+x x x x x x x x x+x+x x x x x x x ma-a {1}{d}AMAR.UTU-A-AŠ x x x x x ina GU₂.DU₈.A{KI} x x x ma-a TA@v GU₂.DU₈.A{KI} x x x ina UGU-hi {ID₂}x x x x x x a-na-ṣar ma-a x x x x x ina GU₂.DU₈.A{KI} x x x x x an-nu-rig ina pa-an LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ a-sa-par-šu₂ LUGAL be-li₂ liš-ʾa-al-šu₂
